column4: Can anyone tell me how to get ubuntu to see windows fileshares? i freaking hate samba right now....

- i want to see all computers from a workgroup using places>network. only way i got this to work was by installing webmin and configuring samba through there to join the workgroup i wanted it to join. all other sorts of workgroup change (including manual edit of smb.conf > "workgroup = WORKGROUP" didnt work.
- and i realy dont want to isntall webmin again
not sure if I can help
